definition.name: Setup Haskell
definition.description: Set up a specific version of GHC and Cabal and add the command-line tools to the PATH
definition.author: GitHub

inputs.name: ghc-version
inputs.description: Version of GHC to use. If set to "latest", it will always get the latest stable version.

inputs.name: cabal-version
inputs.description: Version of Cabal to use. If set to "latest", it will always get the latest stable version.

inputs.name: stack-version
inputs.description: Version of Stack to use. If set to "latest", it will always get the latest stable version.

inputs.name: stack-no-global
inputs.description: If specified, enable-stack must be set. Prevents installing GHC and Cabal globally

inputs.name: stack-setup-ghc
inputs.description: If specified, enable-stack must be set. Will run stack setup to install the specified GHC

outputs.name: ghc-path
outputs.description: The path of the ghc executable _directory_

outputs.name: cabal-path
outputs.description: The path of the cabal executable _directory_

outputs.name: stack-path
outputs.description: The path of the stack executable _directory_

outputs.name: cabal-store
outputs.description: The path to the cabal store
